targets.queryText:
SELECT (pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage || '- ' || pointsComptage.libellePiece) as piece, sum(corrigeeSansPonderationDju)* ${uc} as releve 
FROM consommationChauffage
JOIN pointsComptage
ON pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage = consommationChauffage.numeroPointComptage
WHERE date >= $__from / 1000 and date < $__to / 1000
group by pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage
ORDER BY date, pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage
targets.rawQueryText:

ORDER BY date, pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage

targets.queryText:
SELECT date, (pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage || '- ' || pointsComptage.libellePiece) as piece, corrigeeSansPonderationDju*$uc as releve
FROM consommationChauffage
JOIN pointsComptage
ON pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage = consommationChauffage.numeroPointComptage
WHERE date >= $__from / 1000 and date < $__to / 1000
ORDER BY date, pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT date, (pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage || '- ' || pointsComptage.libellePiece) as piece, corrigeeSansPonderationDju*$uc as releve
FROM consommationChauffage
JOIN pointsComptage
ON pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage = consommationChauffage.numeroPointComptage
WHERE date >= $__from / 1000 and date < $__to / 1000
ORDER BY date, pointsComptage.numeroPointComptage
